title: IQIP-3: Incentivize CEXs marketing / listings
body:
## Authors
Everipedia Team

## Summary
Issue $200,000 equivalent of IQ at time of gov proposal passing in order to incentivize marketing and community activities across different CEXs. 

## Background
IQ has been EOS native until we recently moved to a multichain structure in preparation for launching our native Brainchain later this year. The goal of the IQ community should be to make IQ tokens extremely liquid and attainable in as many ecosystems as possible. To do that, we must first allocate a certain amount of IQ for community / marketing purposes. 

## Purpose
In order to achieve IQ being fully functional across different chains we need to incentivize CEXs to market IQ and create community activities.

## Benefits 
This should overall increase the value of IQ tokens more than the increase in circulation supply as IQ will be used in the growing ecosystems of partner projects. Additionally, the liquidity, expansion to new communities, and brand recognition of the IQ token would likely create substantially more market capitalization and usage in comparison to the small rate increase.
author: 0xaCa39B187352D9805DECEd6E73A3d72ABf86E7A0
